name: Squad Form Styler – Contact Form 7, Gravity Forms, WPForms, and Fluent Forms
author: WP Squad

sections.description:
An advanced Forms Styler plugin for the Divi Page Builder

Unleash the power of seamless design with the Squad Forms Styler module for Divi Builder. No longer will you wrestle with shortcodes or be confined to limited customization. With our module, integrating and designing Contact Form 7, Gravity Forms, or WP Forms becomes an effortless task.

Available Powerful Divi Modules

  1. Divi Form Styler: Contact Form 7 Module: Effortlessly customize Contact Form 7 design. Adjust colors, fonts, spacing, and add CSS for your desired look.
  2. Divi Form Styler: WP Forms Module: Effortlessly customize WP Forms design. Adjust colors, fonts, spacing, and add CSS for your desired look.
  3. Divi Form Styler: Gravity Forms Module: Effortlessly customize Gravity Forms design. Adjust colors, fonts, spacing, and add CSS for your desired look.
  4. Divi Form Styler: Fluent Forms Module: Effortlessly customize Fluent Forms design. Adjust colors, fonts, spacing, and add CSS for your desired look.
  5. Divi Form Styler: Ninja Forms Module: Effortlessly customize Ninja Forms design. Adjust colors, fonts, spacing, and add CSS for your desired look.

Check out the Squad Form Styler demos.

🔥 WHAT’S NEXT

If you like Squad Form Styler, then consider checking out our other WordPress Plugins:

Squad Modules Lite – Advanced Divi plugin for the Divi Page Builder

Rate us on WordPress

We are thankful to you that you have chosen our plugin. If our plugin brings a smile to your face while working, please share your happiness by giving us a 5***** rating in WordPress Org. It will make us happy and wan’t take more than 1 mins.

I Happy to Give You ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️

Backed By A Trusted Team

Squad Form Styler is brought to you by Divi Squad and WP Squad Team, a dedicated WordPress product company.

Support

Support for this plugin is primarily provided within the volunteer-based WordPress support forum. The official website also provides custom development and professional support services. See Support for more information.
sections.installation:
Before Installation

Before installing the Squad Form Styler Plugin, make sure you have the following minimum requirements
– WordPress 5.0 or greater
– PHP version 7.0 or greater
– MySQL version 5.0 or greater
– Divi theme, Extra Theme or Divi Builder Plugin version 4.10 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)

You can install the Squad Form Styler plugin using one of the following methods:

  1. WordPress Plugin Dashboard (Recommended):

    • Go to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to the “Plugins” section and click on “Add New”.
    • In the search field, enter “Squad Form Styler”.
    • Look for the plugin in the search results and click on the “Install Now” button.
    • After the installation is complete, click on the “Activate” button to activate the Squad Form Styler plugin.
    • Once activated, you can start utilizing the wide range of Divi modules within the Divi Builder to enhance your website.

  2. Manual Installation:

    • Visit the WordPress Plugin Directory.
    • Search for “Squad Form Styler”.
    • Click on the “Download” button on the plugin page.
    • Go to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to the “Plugins” section and click on “Add New”.
    • Click on the “Upload Plugin” button.
    • Choose the downloaded plugin file (it will be a ZIP file) and click “Install Now”.
    • After the installation is complete, click on the “Activate” button to activate the Squad Form Styler plugin.
    • Once activated, you can start utilizing the wide range of Divi modules within the Divi Builder to enhance your website.

The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.

Start using the elegant Divi modules in your Divi Builder and enjoy the enhanced capabilities.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free?

Yes! Squad Form Styler is absolutely free. There is no hidden charge.

Are the modules compatible with the latest version of Divi?

Yes, Squad Form Styler is regularly tested and updated to ensure compatibility with the latest version of the Divi theme and Divi Builder.

Can I customize the modules to match my website design?

Absolutely! Squad Form Styler provides a wide range of customization options, allowing you to adjust colors, typography, spacing, and more to create a cohesive look and feel for your website.

What are the system requirements for Squad Form Styler?

Squad Form Styler requires WordPress 5.0.0 or higher and Divi 4.10 or higher. It also requires PHP 5.6 or higher.

Will Squad Form Styler break my site after an update?

No, It won’t break your site or any page where you used our plugin. We put our best effort to make you happy. But we always recommend keeping a backup of your site before updating our plugin. In case anything happens you can revert and contact our support team immediately.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added Fluent Forms styler module.
  • Added Ninja Forms styler module.
  • Resolved issue where background field was not functioning in all form stylers.
  • Fixed problem with border and border radius fields in WPForms styler.
  • Corrected issue where Ninja Forms were not displayed in the forms list.

1.0.0

  • Initial release of Squad Form Styler.
  • Added 3 elegant Divi modules including Contact Form 7 Styler, WP Forms Styler, Gravity Forms Styler Module
  • Basic customization options.
  • Tested for compatibility with Divi 4.23.4
sections.reviews:
Very Helpful for No Code Styling

By bournelegend on April 16, 2024

WPForms is one of the popular no-code form builders available out there. However, when integrating it with Divi, you'll need to manually style the form to align with your branding. This task can be quite tedious for some. That's where this plugin comes in handy.

I hope the dev add the option to adjust the width of fields particularly single line text or at least make it fullwidth in the future releases.
